Hero.description: Your trusted local business providing quality products and services with exceptional customer care.
Hero.quote: We take pride in quality and customer satisfaction.

About.title: About Us
About.description: Baraka is a leading local business dedicated to serving our community with top-tier services and products. With years of experience and a passion for excellence, we strive to exceed customer expectations in everything we do.
About.mission_desc: To deliver quality, value, and satisfaction to every customer we serve.
About.vision_desc: To be the most trusted and preferred local business in our region.
About.values_desc: Integrity, Excellence, Customer Focus, and Innovation.

Reviews.title: Your Reviews
Reviews.subtitle: Share your experience with us
Reviews.eligible_desc: It's been over 6 months since your last review. We'd love to hear from you again.
Reviews.ineligible_desc: You can submit another review in:

tips.1: Your reviews help us improve our services and help other customers make better choices.
tips.2: We read every single review to ensure we meet your expectations.
tips.3: Mentioning specific products helps others decide what to buy.
tips.4: Honest feedback is the key to our continuous improvement.
tips.5: Your voice matters! We take your suggestions seriously.
tips.6: Detailed reviews are the most helpful for our community.
tips.7: Helping us identify what we do best allows us to do more of it.
tips.8: Constructive criticism helps us fix issues you might encounter.
tips.9: Sharing your experience helps build trust in our community.
tips.10: We appreciate the time you take to share your thoughts.

User.hero_subtitle: Discover how to make the most of your Baraka experience with our comprehensive guide.

Admin.payments_desc: Monitor transactions, manage invoices, and track revenue streams in real-time.
Admin.settings_desc: Configure platform settings, manage users, and customize the application to your needs.

explanations.total_revenue: Total sum of all deposits recorded in the system.
explanations.total_animals: Total number of animals currently in stock (Sheep + Goats + Cattle Groups).
explanations.total_weight: Total weight of animals sold (based on final weight).
explanations.weight_purchased: Total weight of animals purchased from suppliers.
explanations.weight_sold: Total final weight of animals sold to customers.
explanations.financial_total: Sum of the final price of all reservations.
explanations.financial_realized: Actual amount collected (Deposits + Fully Paid Orders).
explanations.financial_outstanding: Remaining amount to be collected (Total Order Value - Realized Revenue).
